medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced midepigastric pain that worsened over the past 4 days. The pain began after the patient returned home following a total hysterectomy for uterine cancer approximately one month ago. The pain is aggravated by food intake, particularly dairy products, and leads to decreased appetite and nausea without vomiting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Uterine cancer s/p TAH/BSO, chronic abdominal pain, hypertension, hyperlipidemia, status post total knee replacement and revision, spinal stenosis, s/p cholecystectomy, distant hernia repair, cataracts s/p surgery, nasal polyps s/p removal, urinary incontinence, cystocele, breast calcifications, diverticulosis of the sigmoid colon, CBD dilation s/p sphincterotomy x 2.
medical_history.family_history: Brother with diabetes mellitus on hemodialysis, sister with breast and colon cancer, brother with coronary artery disease status post CABG, father with cerebrovascular accident.
